It's important to communicate openly and honestly without resorting to manipulation or coercion.

With that said, if I had to choose an emotion that I would feel in this situation, I would say that I feel a mix of disappointment and frustration. I hope that in the future, we can work on building a stronger foundation of trust and respect in our relationship, where we feel safe to express our feelings and concerns without resorting to emotion blackmail or other unhealthy communication patterns.
